title: Endru Unnai Kandeno Lyrics Idhayamee Idhayame
stanzas:
<div>
<div>
Endru Unnai Kandeno Lyrics Idhayamee Idhayame

Endru unnai kandeno penne
andre enthan uyirai thanthene(2)

kaalam nindraalum
kaatre nindraalum
un moochchil naanum
vaazhvene kanne.

thegam vittu
raththam ponaalum
en nenjai vittu
unpimbam pogaathu

vaazhum ninaivugale
ennai uyir vazha seiyyum
un kanneer thuliyil
en kaayangal aarum.

un thunbathil naanum
thunaiyaaven.
un kanneeril
naanum thuliyaaven.

jeevan ponaalum
yezhu jenmam ponaalum
un kannam thadavum
kadhal kaatraaven.

kadhal endrum
pookkal thaan ketkum.
kadhal endrum
raththam ketkaathu

kadalil vellam
theernthe ponaalum.
kadhal baanam
theernthe pogaathu.

kaayam nernthaalum
adi maranam neraathu.
un uravuchangili
uyirai kattuthadi

kannil undhan
kadhal ennangal
adhuthaan endhan
vaazhvin arthangal

en nenjai vittu
un ninaivum ponaale
en udalai vittu
uyirum poividume

thegam vittu
raththam ponaalum
en nenjai vittu
unpimbam pogaathu

vaazhum ninaivugale
ennai uyir vazha seiyyum
un kanneer thuliyil
en kaayangal aarum.

un thunbathil naanum
thunaiyaaven.
un kanneeril
naanum thuliyaaven.

jeevan ponaalum
yezhu jenmam ponaalum
un kannam thadavum
kadhal kaatraaven.
